original_text: But the man from the king's family did turn against the king of Babylon. He sent his officers with a message to Egypt. He asked them to send a large army with horses to save Jerusalem. But that will not help him to be safe! He did not obey his agreement with the king of Babylon, so he will not escape!
korean_text: 그가 사절을 애굽에 보내 말과 군대를 구함으로 바벨론 왕을 배반하였으니 형통하겠느냐 이런 일을 행한 자가 피하겠느냐 언약을 배반하고야 피하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: But the man from the king's family
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕의 가문에서 온 그 사람은

sentences.original_text: did turn against the king of Babylon
He sent his officers with a message to Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사신들을 이집트에 보내 메시지를 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: He asked them to send a large army with horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 말과 함께 큰 군대를 보내달라고 요청했습니다

sentences.original_text: But that will not help him to be safe
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 그가 안전해지는 데 도움이 되지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He did not obey his agreement with the king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바빌론 왕과의 약속을 지키지 않았습니다
그러므로 그는 도망칠 수 없을 것입니다
